info.name: PHPNuxBill API (Full)
info.description:
Generated from docs/api.md. Base URL: {{baseUrl}} (system/api.php).
Generated at: 2026-02-06T09:34:34Z
Notes:
- Optional: set admin_api_key + use_admin_api_key=1 to send X-Admin-Api-Key for admin requests.
- Optional: set use_token_header=1 to also send X-Auth-Token from the token query param.
- Run Smoke Tests to validate connectivity and auth.
- Admin/customer tokens are captured from admin/post and login/post.
- Mixed endpoints accept either admin or customer token; default uses admin_token.
- Some endpoints return non-JSON (CSV/PDF/HTML).

exec: let j = {}; try { j = pm.response.json(); } catch (e) { j = null; }
if (j) { pm.test('JSON has success field', function () { pm.expect(j).to.have.property('success'); }); }
